title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.10 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.10 - Public notice

State Regulations

The records access officer shall cause public notice to be
posted in Building 9, State Campus, Albany, NY 12227, and all other buildings
occupied by the department, informing members of the public of his business
location and telephone number; the time and place records will be made
available for inspection and copying; the name, business address and telephone
number of the department's fiscal officer; and the notice shall inform the
individual of his right to appeal the denial of access to requested records and
provide him with the name, business address and telephone number of the records
appeals officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2370.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
